alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 22 at 7:00PM CDT until April 22 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Wichita County in west central Kansas... Southeastern Logan County in west central Kansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 700 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Leoti, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to two inches in diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wichita and southeastern Logan Counties, including the following locations... Marienthal. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
